resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158234</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158234</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2884</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Teenagers Hotline</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jugendlich-Hotline</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ligne directe d'Adolescents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hotline Dos Teenagers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Linea aperta Degli Adolescenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αμεση επικοινωνία εφήβων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Teléfono directo De los Adolescentes</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for an activity where students give written explanations for the importance of a hot-line for teenagers, and then implement a simulation of an interaction on the hotline between a teenager with a rpoblem and an advisor.Includes assessment rubric</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">verbal communication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine Aktivität, in der 
Kursteilnehmer schriftliche Erklärungen für den Wert einer Hotline 
für Jugendliche geben und führen dann eine Simulation einer 
Interaktion auf der Hotline zwischen einem Jugendlichen mit einem 
rpoblem und einer advisor.Includes Einschätzung Rubrik ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour une activité où les 
étudiants donnent des explications écrites pour l'importance d'une 
ligne directe pour des adolescents, et mettent en application alors 
une simulation d'une interaction sur la ligne directe entre un 
adolescent avec un rpoblem et une rubrique d'évaluation 
d'advisor.Includes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para uma atividade onde os 
estudantes dêem explanações escritas para a importância de um 
hot-line para teenagers, e executa então uma simulação de uma 
interação no hotline entre um teenager com um rpoblem e um rubric da
avaliação de advisor.Includes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per un'attività dove gli
allievi danno le spiegazioni scritte per l'importanza di una linea 
aperta per gli adolescenti ed allora effettua una simulazione di 
un'interazione sulla linea aperta fra un adolescente con un rpoblem e 
una rubrica di valutazione di advisor.Includes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια δραστηριότητα όπου οι 
σπουδαστές δίνουν τις γραπτές εξηγήσεις για τη σημασία μιας 
άμεσης επικοινωνίας για τους εφήβους, και εφαρμόζει έπειτα μια 
προσομοίωση μιας αλληλεπίδρασης στην άμεση επικοινωνία μεταξύ 
έφηβος με ένα rpoblem και ένας σύμβουλος περιλαμβάνει τη 
ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para una actividad donde 
los estudiantes dan las explicaciones escritas para la importancia de 
un teléfono directo para los adolescentes, y entonces pone una 
simulación en ejecucio'n de una interacción en el teléfono directo 
entre un adolescente con un rpoblem y una rúbrica del gravamen de 
advisor.Includes</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">mündliche Kommunikation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einschätzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transmission verbale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">évaluation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">uma comunicação verbal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">avaliação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">valutazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορική έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεκτική επικοινωνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αξιολόγηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comunicación verbal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

        </general>
